fields.name: Potion of Healing
fields.description: A small vial containing a bright red liquid that restores health when consumed. Don't mix them up.

fields.name: Longsword
fields.description: A versatile melee weapon commonly used by fighters and paladins.

fields.name: Shield
fields.description: A sturdy circular item for defence that increases your AC by 2.

fields.name: Rope, 50 feet
fields.description: A sturdy rope made of hemp, essential for climbing and adventuring. It does actually run out eventually.

fields.name: Torches
fields.description: Basic wooden torches used to illuminate dark areas. Good for burning things too.

fields.name: Bag of Holding
fields.description: A magical bag capable of holding much more than it appears. I wonder what would happen if you step inside the bag.

fields.name: Spellbook
fields.description: A tome used by wizards to record their spells. Don't lose it or you won't be able to remember anything.

fields.name: Dagger
fields.description: A small sharp blade which can be easily concealed.

fields.name: Magic Wand
fields.description: A wand used by spellcasters to channel their magic. I'm a what...

fields.name: Rations
fields.description: Preserved food that lasts for weeks, essential for long journeys.

fields.name: Lantern
fields.description: A hooded lantern that provides light in a wide radius. When there is rain, a torch is no help.

fields.name: Leather Armor
fields.description: Light armor made of hardened leather. It keeps you protected and nimble all at once.

fields.name: Studded Leather Armor
fields.description: Light armor reinforced with metal studs for extra protection.

fields.name: Chainmail
fields.description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings. No blade will pierce it.

fields.name: Greatsword
fields.description: A massive two-handed sword that deals devastating damage.

fields.name: Mace
fields.description: A blunt weapon which is ideal for clerics and smashing skulls.

fields.name: Crossbow
fields.description: A ranged weapon that fires bolts. Takes a while to reload though.

fields.name: Arrows (20)
fields.description: A bundle of 20 arrows for use with a bow. Remember it isn't a bolt, the same but different.

fields.name: Healing Kit
fields.description: A kit containing bandages and salves for stabilizing wounds. Sure to come in handy when in a pickle.

fields.name: Ring of Protection
fields.description: A magical ring that increases the wearer's AC by 2.

fields.name: Enchanted Cloak
fields.description: A cloak imbued with protective magic. It will increase AC by 2

fields.name: Boots of Speed
fields.description: Magical boots that increase the wearer's movement speed. A most useful item.

fields.name: Alchemist's Supplies
fields.description: Tools used to create potions and chemicals. It's no philosopher's stone.

fields.name: Scroll of Fireball
fields.description: A magical scroll containing the Fireball spell. Deadly but useful, don't stand too close.

fields.name: Potion of Invisibility
fields.description: A potion that renders the drinker invisible for a short time. The label reads, 'Should be used for noble acts only'.

fields.name: Gemstone
fields.description: A valuable gemstone often used as currency or in magical rituals.

fields.name: Map of the Region
fields.description: A detailed map showing the surrounding areas. Please don't put it next to coffee.

fields.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
fields.description: A magical wand that can cast Magic Missile.

fields.name: Ring of Water Walking
fields.description: A magical ring that allows the wearer to walk on water. Walk on water they said, and so they did.

fields.name: Bag of Sand
fields.description: A small bag of sand used for various purposes. You could always chuck it in someones eyes.

fields.name: Lantern of Revealing
fields.description: A magical lantern that reveals invisible creatures and objects. Check every nook and cranny.

fields.name: Portable Hole
fields.description: A magical piece of cloth that creates an extradimensional storage space.

fields.name: Iron Spikes (10)
fields.description: Sturdy spikes used for climbing or securing structures.

fields.name: Herbalism Kit
fields.description: A kit containing tools and ingredients for creating herbal remedies.

fields.name: Mirror, Small Steel
fields.description: A small polished steel mirror useful for seeing around corners.

fields.name: Driftglobe
fields.description: A magical globe that emits light and can float. It's not a ghost.

fields.name: Ring of Feather Falling
fields.description: A magical ring that slows the wearer's descent. If your friend jumps off a cliff would you follow? Uhmm...

fields.name: Potion of Giant Strength
fields.description: A potion that temporarily grants the strength of a giant. Be careful, it will stop working at some point.

fields.name: Quarterstaff
fields.description: A wooden staff often used by monks and wizards. You will always see a Halfing with this when going for a stroll.

fields.name: Ring of Spell Storing
fields.description: A magical ring that can store and release spells.

fields.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
fields.description: A cloak that enhances stealth and conceals the wearer. Almost like an invisiblity cloak, but not quite.

fields.name: Boots of the Winterlands
fields.description: Magical boots that protect against cold weather. Keep them toes nice and toasty.

fields.name: Alchemy Jug
fields.description: A magical jug that produces various liquids on command.

fields.name: Spyglass
fields.description: A telescope used for observing distant objects. Eye spy with my little eye.

fields.name: Ring of Evasion
fields.description: A magical ring that allows the wearer to evade danger. Not literally, but you will find dodging a lot easier.

fields.name: Bag of Tricks
fields.description: A magical bag that produces random creatures to assist you. It could be a mighty lion, most likely a little rat though.

fields.name: Horn of Blasting
fields.description: A magical horn that creates a powerful blast when blown.

fields.name: Amulet of Health
fields.description: A magical amulet that increases the wearer's Constitution score.

fields.name: Pearl of Power
fields.description: A magical pearl that restores spell slots to spellcasters.

fields.name: Rod of the Pact Keeper
fields.description: A magical rod that enhances a warlock's spellcasting abilities.
